      • loadFile

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.StringBuilder> loadFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Method that helps to load data from initial log file. Uses fastest methodology- file mapping through NIO library.
        Parameters:
        fileName- - the name of input file
        Returns:
        list of strings contained in the initial file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • dataOperation

        public static void dataOperation(java.lang.String fileName)
        Primary method for operation with data. The basic algorithm is based on the assumption, that every second must need to start from input. So if we have one output which does not fit in a second, we will add it to the set of considered outputs and for this reason, sometimes considered interval can include a little more time than one second. In addition, we considered time delays so that if some input doesn't have output in the analyzed time interval it will not be taken into account. It invokes loadFile(fileName) method as well as auxiliary methods: findTime, findId, findType.

      • findTime

        Method to find and collect time of input or output from String
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public static void writeTextToFileWithoutRewrite(java.lang.String fileName,

        Parameters:

        text - is the text that will be put in file.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method contains entry point for logger and for calculations. It invokes only one method- dataOperation.
